theme.description: Semantic color roles for extensions (theme.text, theme.ui, theme.ui_active).

status_bar.description: Footer showing filename, dirty state, cursor position, and status messages.

tabs.description: Multiple buffers with a tab bar. Ctrl+K/L to switch, Ctrl+N for new tab.

save_untitled.description: Prompts for a filename when saving an untitled buffer.

line_numbers.description: Shows a column of line numbers to the left of the text.
